tasks.label: Create Site Structure
args: echo '🏗️ Starting Site Structure creation...' && echo '🏗️ Site Structure' > ${workspaceFolder}/site_structure.md && echo 'Created initial file' && find ${workspaceFolder} -type d \( -path '*/node_modules' -o -path '*/.cache' -o -path '*/build' -o -path '*/public/build' \) -prune -o -type f -print | sed -e 's#${workspaceFolder}/##' -e 's/[^-][^\/]*\//  │   /g' -e 's/│   \([^│]\)/│   ├── \1/' -e 's/\(│   \)*│   └/\1    └/' -e 's/└── /├── /' -e '$s/├── /└── /' >> ${workspaceFolder}/site_structure.md && echo 'Generated structure' && code -r ${workspaceFolder}/site_structure.md && echo '🏗️ Site Structure creation completed.'
